dates.doorCountHelpFlexible: Choose how many doors the calendar should have (1-31)

quiz.title: Select participant type
quiz.description: Do you want quiz questions or just collect email addresses?

emailOnly.title: Email Only
emailOnly.description: Collect email addresses without quiz. All participants are qualified for the draw.

withQuiz.title: With Quiz
withQuiz.description: Each door gets 3 questions that participants must answer. Only those who answer well enough are entered in the draw for that door.

settings.title: Quiz settings
settings.infoTitle: How quiz works in the calendar:
infoItems: Each door gets 3 questions (can be edited later per door)
Participants answer the questions each time they open a door
Their score determines if they qualify for the draw for that specific door
This repeats for each door they open throughout the calendar
settings.passingScoreHelp:
**Example:** If you set 70% and a door has 3 questions, participants must get at least 2 correct to be entered in the draw.

**Tip:** Set to 0% if everyone should be entered regardless of correct answers.
settings.showCorrectAnswersHelp: Participants see which answers were correct and wrong after they've answered the quiz
settings.allowRetryHelp: Let participants try the quiz again if they didn't get enough correct answers
settings.aiInstructionsPlaceholder: E.g. 'Create questions about Norwegian Christmas traditions and Santa' or leave blank for general questions
settings.aiInstructionsHelp: Customize AI-generated questions with your own instructions
settings.generateAuto: Generate all quizzes automatically with AI
settings.generateAutoHelp: ✨ AI will generate 3 questions for each door automatically when the calendar is created. You can edit them later.

features: Access to all templates and 20+ languages

features.description: Design atmospheric experiences, collect first-party data responsibly and convert participants with automated follow-up – all in Lukely.

howItWorks.label: How Lukely works

steps.title: Design the calendar

steps.title: Market and engage
steps.description: Embed it on the website, run paid and organic campaigns and automate daily reminders that bring the audience back.

steps.title: Convert and report
steps.description: Sync leads to the CRM, track conversions in real-time and optimize next year's campaign with detailed insights.

faqs.heading: Frequently asked about Lukely
faqs.description: Get the details about launching seasonal campaigns, collecting consents and connecting Lukely to the tools you already use.
faqs.footer: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our

items.question: How quickly can we launch a Lukely campaign?
items.answer: Most teams go live within a few days. Choose a template, add prizes and content, and use our preview for approval before publishing. Need help? The onboarding team supports with copy, design and integrations.

items.question: Is Lukely compliant with GDPR and other privacy regulations?
items.answer: Yes. Lukely has consent boxes, double opt-in, IP filtering, age gates and complete audit logs. You can export consent data anytime or sync them automatically to your marketing tools.

items.question: Can we use our own design and domain?
items.answer: Absolutely. Upload your own fonts, colors and animations, and display the calendar on your own domain or directly in the CMS. Agencies can clone campaigns for multiple brands and keep resources organized.

items.question: Which tools does Lukely integrate with?
items.answer: Connect Lukely to HubSpot, Mailchimp, Klaviyo, Salesforce, Zapier, Meta Ads, Google Analytics and more. The REST API and webhooks let you send events to all internal systems in real-time.

items.question: What support is included?
items.answer: All plans include live chat and email support, onboarding resources and campaign checklists. Enterprise customers can add multilingual support, custom SLAs and managed services.

testimonials.heading: What customers say about Lukely
testimonials.description: Join global brands using Lukely to drive engaging seasonal campaigns, build subscriber lists and create measurable holiday revenue.

items.name: Yves Kalume
items.quote: Lukely helped us collect 38,000 qualified leads in three weeks. The consent feature and integrations allowed our team to activate all contacts before Christmas.

items.name: Meschac Irung
items.quote: We launched in 20 languages without developer support. Lukely kept the brand experience consistent everywhere and doubled our opt-in rate year over year.

items.name: Bernard Ngandu
items.quote: GDPR processes slowed us down before. Lukely handles consent, double opt-in and audit logs, so legal and marketing finally work in sync.

items.name: Glodie Lukose
items.quote: Daily reminders and instant draws brought the audience back. Engagement stayed above 60% throughout the campaign.

items.name: Theo Balick
items.quote: We built Lukely so marketers can move fast without sacrificing security or brand control. Seeing customers hit their holiday goals is why we do this.

items.name: Ras Micky
items.quote: Lukely gave us flexibility to match each giveaway with our product launches. The template editing is intuitive but powerful enough for custom animations.

featured.name: Adam Wathan
featured.quote: Lukely removed all technical barriers. We rebranded the calendar, localized the content and automated prizes – all in one dashboard in under a day.

featured.name: Shadcn
featured.quote: Automated reminders keep our subscribers excited. Daily visits stayed above 70%, and we increased SMS consent 3.4x compared to previous campaigns.

featured.name: Glodie Lukose
featured.quote: The reporting suite shows exactly which prizes, channels and segments convert best. The insights lifted our resale revenue by 18%.

cta.heading: Run unforgettable seasonal campaigns with Lukely
cta.description: Join over 1000 brands that attract new subscribers, increase revenue and delight their customers with interactive experiences.

footer.description: Lukely helps marketing teams launch interactive seasonal campaigns and collect consent-based first-party data.
